牮字的基本解释

牮
jiàn
斜着支撑：打牮拨正（房屋倾斜，用柱子支起弄正）。
用土石挡水。

牮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《字彙》作甸切］
(1)撑屋使不倾斜。
(2)用土石挡水。亦指土石构筑的挡水的设施。

牮字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　牮； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页699第22
【字彙】作甸切，音薦。屋斜用牮。　又以土石遮水亦曰牮。

牮字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
牮字的起名意思

指斜着支撑或用土石挡水，亦指土石构筑的挡水设施。

prop
Basic explanation of words
prop
jiàn
Oblique support: set the stone upright (the house is inclined, and the pillar is used to support it).
Retain water with earth and rocks.
prop
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Words" is cut]
(1) Support the house so that it does not tilt.
(2) Use earth and rocks to block water. It also refers to the water retaining facilities built by earth and stone.
prop
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 2] [Bull Character Department] 　牮; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 699-22
[Vocabulary] Make a sharp cut, recommend sound. The house is obliquely used.　It is also said that soil and stone cover the water.

Refers to oblique support or retaining water with earth and rock, and also refers to water retaining facilities constructed of earth and rock.
